_template.name: Protect Files Hook
_template.description: Prevent editing sensitive files like .env, package-lock.json, etc.
_template.note: This uses a separate script for complex logic

hooks.command: FILE=$(cat | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path'); case "$FILE" in *.env|*package-lock.json|*.git/*) echo "Blocked: $FILE is protected" >&2; exit 2;; esac
